visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type is column, chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels styling includes blue color for labels, 14px font size for titles, and 12px font size for labels, data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with the data provided, custom colors are blue and light blue, additional configurations include a white background, legend positioned at the bottom, and chart margins set to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The axes and labels are styled with a blue color and different font sizes for titles and labels. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with the provided data. Custom colors are applied to the series, and additional configurations include a white background, legend positioned at the bottom, and specific chart margins for better spacing. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
